extendedInfo.description: Check your today fortune by your horoscope and birthday. This free app Daily Horoscope Fortune can foretell the fortune of today and tomorrow for 12 horoscopes. Just believe that efforts pay off.2.    WE MAY ALLOWS OUR ADS PARTNER TO ADD ICON ADS OR NOTIFICATION ADS IN THIS APP TO KEEP THIS TOTALLY FREE.########### A horoscope can be an astrological chart or diagram representing the positions of the Sun, Moon, planets, astrological aspects, and sensitive angles at the time of an event, such as the moment of a person's birth.Fortune-telling might be the practice of predicting information about a person's life. The scope of fortune-telling could be in principle identical with the practice of divination. The difference might be that divination is the term used for predictions considered part of a religious ritual, invoking deities or spirits, while the term fortune-telling may imply a less serious or formal setting, even one of popular culture, where belief in occult workings behind the prediction might be less prominent than the concept of suggestion, spiritual or practical advisory or affirmation.
